content: nautilus 1954 is a community of knitters and crocheters that have taken the mission to express gratitude and love to our united states navy submarine fleet through handknit & crocheted superwash wool hats find us on facebook nautilus1954 instagram @nautilus_1954 and join our ravelry group for more information ssb beanie star spangled banner or submersible ship ballistic aka submarine you choose ☺ yarn requirements worsted weight 100% superwash wool sample knit in cascade yarns 220 superwash merino color a red 30g 66 yards color b white 12g 27 yards color c blue 30g 66 yards needles us7 16 circular needles or size to create desired fabric & dpns or magic loop needles for crown decreases * optional us8 or one size larger than main needles for knitting the body stars colorwork section gauge 22 stitches x 24 row = 4 in pattern finished size adult beanie one size fits most abbreviations k knit p purl co cast-on k2tog knit 2 stitches together pattern with us7 needles cast on 96 stitches place marker and join for working in the round being careful not to twist the stitches brim rounds 1 18 with color a red knit 2 x 2 ribbing k2 p2 in the round brim measures 3 from co edge body stripes round 1 - 2 with color a red knit all stitches round 3 - 4 with color b white knit all stitches round 5 - 6 with color a knit all stitches round 7 - 8 with color b knit all stitches round 9 - 10 with color a knit all stitches round 11 - 12 with color b knit all stitches break color a body stars * optional switch to us8 or one size larger than main needles for colorwork round 1 and all odd rounds with color c blue knit all stitches round 2 k1 with color c k1 with color b k3 with color c until the last 3 stitches k1 with color b k2 with color c round 4 k3 with color c k1 with color b repeat until end of round round 6 repeat round 2 round 8 repeat round 4 round 10 repeat round 2 round 12 repeat round 4 round 14 repeat round 2 round 16 repeat round 4 round 18 repeat round 2 break color b with color c knit one more round or until hat measures 8 from co edge crown decreases continue with color c blue round 1 *k10 k2tog* continue to end of round round 2 knit all stitches round 3 *k9 k2tog* continue to end of round round 4 knit all stitches round 5 *k8 k2tog* continue to end of round round 6 knit all stitches round 7 *k7 k2tog* continue to end of round round 8 knit all stitches round 9 *k6 k2tog* continue to end of round round 10 knit all stitches round 11 *k5 k2tog* continue to end of round round 12 knit all stitches round 13 *k4 k2tog* continue to end of
